com.googlecode.gwtmvc.client
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.gwtmvc.client.Controller

public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

The controller acts as a coordinator. It responds to user gestures, call the model and select the correct view.
USAGE: The controller knows its models and can call their methods.

tryConvertBrowserEventToControllerEvent

protected abstract Event tryConvertBrowserEventToControllerEvent(BrowserEvent browserEvent)
                                                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Try to convert the event

Parameters:
browserEvent -
Returns:
a new event if the controller coul handle it, null otherwise
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the browser Event token dont match with any action. It is the normal way to signal that this controller conldnt handle this token
